about_the_game:
The Astatos Original Soundtrack by Esteban Tamashiro with more than two dozen original tracks, is an eclectic album that blends the flavours of ancient instruments with epic orchestrations, religious undertones, and chill and cozy tunes. A thrilling musical journey that brings our card-battling-hero-flipping adventure to life!

  • Volume One of the Astatos Original Soundtrack is currently available, with Volume Two being added closer to the game leaving Early Access.

A thrilling musical journey that brings our card-battling-hero-flipping adventure to life!

  • Volume One of the Astatos Original Soundtrack is currently available, with Volume Two being added closer to the game leaving Early Access.
